full_strength.text:
prepare solution of (_amount_) mg (_amount_ml_) ml of Morphine inj with (_ns_amount_) ml of 0.9% NS 
 (20mcg/Kg/ml)

double_strength.text:
prepare solution of (_amount_) mg (_amount_ml_) ml of Morphine inj with (_ns_amount_) ml of 0.9% NS 
 (40mcg/Kg/ml)

half_strength.text:
prepare solution of (_amount_) mg (_amount_ml_) ml of Morphine inj with (_ns_amount_) mL of 0.9% NS 
 (10mcg/Kg/ml)

formula_50ml.single_strength:
prepare solution of (500mcg) 10ml of Fentanyl inj with 40 ml of 0.9% NS 
 (10mcg/ml)
formula_50ml.double_strength:
prepare solution of (1000mcg) 20 ml of Fentanyl inj with 30 ml of 0.9% NS 
 (20mcg/ml)

medications.name: Remifentanil inj (5mg) dilute in 5 ml WFI

formula_50ml.minimum_strength: prepare solution of (1mg) 1ml of Remifentanil inj with 49ml of 0.9% NS (20mcg/ml)
formula_50ml.maximum_strength: prepare solution of (5mg) 5ml of Remifentanil inj with 45ml of 0.9% NS (250mcg/ml)
